AND:	0b00011011 & 0b01111101 =	0b00011001
OR:	0b00011011 |  0b01111101 = 	0b01111111
XOR:	0b00011011 ^ 0b01111101 = 	0b01100110

ROTATIONS
rotr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 0) = 		0b00011011
rotr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 1) = 		0b10001101
rotr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 2) = 		0b11000110
rotr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 3) = 		0b01100011
rotr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 4) = 		0b10110001
rotl(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 1) = 		0b00110110
rotl(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 2) = 		0b01101100
rotl(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 3) = 		0b11011000
rotl(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 4) = 		0b10110001

SIGN-EXTENDING ARITHMETIC SHIFT RIGHT
asr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 1) = 		0b00001101
asr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 2) = 		0b00000110
asr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 3) = 		0b00000011
asr(8, 0b000000000000000000000000008b, 4) = 		0b00000001
